Learning Lab Notes

installation

cli

usage

  • gh repo

    • create interactively

        gh repo create

github pages

uses jekyll

setup

  • Settings>Pages

    • “Deploy from a branch” main
    • Click the Save button.

  • create “./_config.yml”

    example

      theme: minima
  title: dev notes
  author: elliot reed
  description: notes

site

  • create “./index.md” or “./README.md”
    • add homepage content
  • jekyll, create blog with files named “_posts/YYYY-MM-DD-title.md”

  • include title and date

    ---
title: "YOUR-TITLE"
date: YYYY-MM-DD
---
